thread.title: UTC Aerospace in Foley picked as one of country's best plants
thread.title_full: UTC Aerospace in Foley picked as one of country's best plants

author: Lawrence Specker | lspecker@al.com
title: UTC Aerospace in Foley picked as one of country's best plants
text: Being picked as one of IndustryWeek's best plants of 2016 didn't come as a complete surprise to leaders at UTC Aerospace in Foley. "It is a tremendous deal for us. But really it shows what we all had known." said General Manager Darrell B. Wilson.
